sys_template.name: Branch - Disconnected Screens
sys_template.short_description: Disconnected sessions still logged on at the branch
sys_template.template:
short_description=Disconnected sessions still logged on at the branch^instructions=**PLEASE CHECK USERS UI VERSION AND FIX IF NEEDED** Branch Database that port is on:
Do CT GM.TIPHS XXXX (Where XXXX is the port number).
If that comes back with anything other than "Not on file" - then don't log the port off. Speak to a senior/manager.
Do ANALYZE XXXX (Where XXXX is the port number). Paste the details below:^affected_system=Branch Systems (RPN)^cmdb_ci=SFT-LOGINPICK-RPN^close_notes=1. UI OUT OF DATE [Y/N] 2.Analyst tandemed port(s) and logged off. [ ] 3. Used the LOGOFF command to log the port off [ ] 4. Senior/Manager logged port(s) off. [ ] Logged off by 5. Took no action to log off the port(s) [ ]^contact_type=phone^impact=3^category=^subcategory=^close_code=Solved (Permanently)
